    • Game

      public Game​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playersNicknames, int pyramidHeight, int prodSlotNum, int numOfPlayers) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, com.google.gson.JsonIOException, com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
      Custom rules multiplayer constructor: standard rules but different player parameters
      Parameters:
      playersNicknames - is the list of the connected player's nicknames
      pyramidHeight - is the initial DefaultDeposit number
      prodSlotNum - is the initial DevelopmentProduction slot number
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if one of the configuration files is missing or it cannot be opened
      com.google.gson.JsonIOException
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException

      Parameters:
      playerNickname - is the list of the connected player's nicknames

      Parameters:
      playersNicknames - are the connected players' nicknames
      pyramidHeight - is the custom dimension of the Player's deposits
      prodSlotNum - is the custom dimension of the Player's production slots number

    • drawDecider

      private void drawDecider​(java.util.ArrayList<Player> maxPointPlayers)
      In case of equal points determines which player has more resources. In case of equal points and resources
      it calls the game a draw and picks the winners.
